item.title: Olakana Melana
item.description: Dola Purnima is a popular festival in the coastal districts of Odisha.

item.title: Ratha Yatra
item.description: Ratha Jatra is a Hindu festival associated with Lord Jagannath held at Shri Kshetra Puri Dham in the state of Odisha, India.
